name: Botanical Box
description:
Grow plants outdoors with random weather.

Throw seeds on icons to plant them. Grow tall enough to blossom before the season ends. Flowers give you more seeds to throw and collect. Win new seeds by throwing seeds you have too much of.

Features:

~ six characteristic plants

~ weather system, with rain, clouds, lightning, sunshine

~ six happy little animals

~ seed box, watering can, time acceleration device

Photosynthesizzle! Get growing!
